Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Park Inn by Radisson Bedford places you in the heart of Bedford, steps from St. Paul's Church and close to Bedford Park. This eco-friendly hotel is within the region of Colmworth and North Bedfordshire Golf Club and Shuttleworth Collection.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 120 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Your room comes with a Select Comfort bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Bedford? This hotel has facilities measuring 4230 square feet (393 square meters), including meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and a television in the lobby.
Make yourself at home in one of the 120 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Your room comes with a Select Comfort bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

A stay at Park Inn by Radisson Bedford places you in the heart of Bedford, steps from St. Paul's Church and close to Bedford Park. This eco-friendly hotel is within the region of Colmworth and North Bedfordshire Golf Club and Shuttleworth Collection.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

St. Paul's Church - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Bedford Park - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Colmworth and North Bedfordshire Golf Club - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Shuttleworth Collection - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi
Swiss Garden - 11.1 km / 6.9 mi
Church of Saint Peter - 11.5 km / 7.2 mi
Bedford Autodrome - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi
Wyboston Lakes Golf Course - 14.1 km / 8.8 mi
Woburn Safari Park - 15.8 km / 9.8 mi
Woburn Abbey - 19 km / 11.8 mi
Paxton Pits Nature Reserve - 19.7 km / 12.2 mi
Gullivers Land - 20.2 km / 12.5 mi
Milton Keynes Theatre - 21.8 km / 13.5 mi
Central Milton Keynes Shopping Centre - 22.1 km / 13.8 mi
National Bowl - 24 km / 14.9 mi

The preferred airport for Park Inn by Radisson Bedford is London (LTN-Luton) - 29 km / 18 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

London Luton Airport (LTN): Approximate distance to Park Inn Bedford is 22.5 miles (36 kilometres).

Driving directions from London Luton Airport: At the roundabout, take the second exit onto Airport Way (at the 'Way Out, All Routes' sign). At the airport roundabout, take the first exit onto Airport Way-A505 (at the 'Dunstable, Luton Town Centre' sign). Continue on A505 for about 2.5 miles (4 kilometres) and at the roundabout take the second exit onto Telford Way-A6 (at the 'Bedford' sign). Stay in the left lane to continue. At the Stockington roundabout, take the second exit onto New Bedford Rd-A6 (at the 'Bedford' sign). Continue on A6 (at the 'Bedford' sign) for about 17.5 miles (28 kilometres). At the roundabout, take the first exit onto Kingsway (at the 'Town Centre, Kettering, Northampton A428' sign). Take the right lane. Turn right onto St Paul's Square (at the 'Town Centre, Kettering, Northampton' sign). Turn right onto High Street-A6. Turn left onto Duckmill Lane. Turn left into the hotel car park.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
